nodes.text: The Hunt Begins is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 15, 2004 and took the form of a short story in which a Jedi Padawan was pursued by strange Jedi hunters. Her Jedi Master and two other Padawans had already been killed by the hunters, and she was endeavoring to reach a comm tower to contact the Jedi on Almas. She was, however, killed before we could manage to do so.
